item.description:
We missed out the biking trip last time from the rain so join us again for a nice bike ride along the Minuteman Trail. We will start off in Bedford and head towards Lexington and beyond. We will stop off for refreshments along the route.

Don't have a bike? You can rent at Bikeway Source where we will be meeting. Rates are reasonable @ $20 for half day (4 hours). After biking, we will head to Woburn for some awesome spicy authentic sichuan food at Sichuan Garden II.  If you need a ride or want to carpool, please indicate what T stop and town/city you are coming from. One of our members may be able to offer you a carpool.

﻿﻿﻿ www.bikewaysource.com

﻿ http://www.sichuangarden2.com/woburn.shtml
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in front of the store - Bikeway Source.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Biking and Sichuan Dinner
